message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $10,000. I hope this aligns better with my budget. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is unfortunately a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,500,  which reflects the value of the product and allows for some room for negotiation.  Let me know if this works for you!

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet you at $11,500. I would like to propose a final offer of $10,500. This amount closely aligns with my budget while still acknowledging the product's worth. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
